## ResourceJson.ResourceDeclCollection class

Class that extracts resources and candidates from a [resource collection declaration](./ts-res.resourcejson.json.iresourcecollectiondecl.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ResourceDeclCollection implements IResourceDeclContainer 
```
**Implements:** [IResourceDeclContainer](./ts-res.resourcejson.iresourcedeclcontainer.md)
